Lack of evidence: Despite extensive online searches, no news stories or records were found suggesting that Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez ever worked at or was fired from Hot Dog on a Stick.
Testimony from company representative: Kathleen Shaffer, senior director of creative and communications for the Global Franchise Group, stated that there is no record of Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez being employed at Hot Dog on a Stick.
Inconsistencies in the claim: The Facebook post misspells Ocasio-Cortez's first name and features a photo that does not resemble her. The image was later identified as someone named Stephanie, not Alexandria.
Alternative sources: The same photo used in the claim was found on other websites and platforms, unrelated to Ocasio-Cortez, suggesting that it is a template or stock image.
